data.eml:eml: Richness, systematics, and distribution of molluscs associated with the macroalga Gigartinaskottsbergii in the Strait of Magellan, Chile: A biogeographic affinity study

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Rosenfeld, Sebastian, Aldea, Cristian, Mansilla, Andres, Marambio, Johanna, Ojeda, Jaime (2015): Richness, systematics, and distribution of molluscs associated with the macroalga Gigartinaskottsbergii in the Strait of Magellan, Chile: A biogeographic affinity study. ZooKeys 519: 49-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.519.9676, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.519.9676
